body:
The Ministry of Justice (MoJ) runs this guide.

We try to make sure the information we provide is accurate and complete and the guide is always available and virus free.

The MoJ accepts no liability for:

- you being unable to access the guide (for example due to high demand or because we've taken it down for maintenance)
- indirect damages arising from you reading the guide or relying on its content
- the content and availability of external websites that link to the guide or which link from it
heading: Responsibility for the guide
